verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>responded,<s%> <S%H559><s%>
<S%H575>"How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you <S%H3013>torment<s%> me, And <S%H1792>crush<s%> me with <S%H4405>words<s%>?
<S%H2088>"These<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> you have <S%H3637>insulted<s%> me, You are not <S%H954>ashamed<s%> to <S%H1970>wrong<s%> me.
<S%H637>"Even<s%> if I have <S%H551>truly<s%> <S%H7686>erred,<s%> My <S%H4879>error<s%> <S%H3885>lodges<s%> with me.
<S%H518>"If<s%> <S%H551>indeed<s%> you <S%H1431>vaunt<s%> yourselves <S%H5921>against<s%> me, And <S%H3198>prove<s%> my <S%H2781>disgrace<s%> to me,
<S%H3045>Know<s%> <S%H645>then<s%> that <S%H433>God<s%> has <S%H5791>wronged<s%> me, And has <S%H5362>closed<s%> His <S%H9285>net<s%> <S%H5362>around<s%> me.

<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> I <S%H6817>cry,<s%> <S%H2555>'Violence!<s%>' but I <S%H6030>get<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6030>answer;<s%> I <S%H7768>shout<s%> for <S%H7768>help,<s%> but <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4941>justice.<s%>
"He has <S%H1443>walled<s%> up my <S%H734>way<s%> so that I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H5674>pass;<s%> And He has <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> on my <S%H9350>paths.<s%>
"He has <S%H6584>stripped<s%> my <S%H9202>honor<s%> from me, And <S%H5493>removed<s%> the <S%H5850>crown<s%> from my <S%H7218>head.<s%>
"He <S%H5422>breaks<s%> me <S%H5422>down<s%> on <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side,<s%> and I am <S%H1980>gone;<s%> And He has <S%H5265>uprooted<s%> my <S%H8615>hope<s%> like a <S%H6086>tree.<s%>
"He has also <S%H2734>kindled<s%> His <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, And <S%H2803>considered<s%> me as His <S%H6862>enemy.<s%>

"His <S%H1416>troops<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> And <S%H5549>build<s%> up their <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, And <S%H2583>camp<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> my <S%H168>tent.<s%>
"He has <S%H7368>removed<s%> my <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from me, And my <S%H3045>acquaintances<s%> are <S%H389>completely<s%> <S%H2114>estranged<s%> from me.
"My <S%H7138>relatives<s%> have <S%H2308>failed,<s%> And my <S%H3045>intimate<s%> <S%H3045>friends<s%> have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> me.

"Those who <S%H1481>live<s%> in my <S%H1004>house<s%> and my <S%H519>maids<s%> <S%H2803>consider<s%> me a <S%H2114>stranger.<s%> I <S%H1961>am<s%> a <S%H5237>foreigner<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight.<s%>
"I <S%H7121>call<s%> to my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> but he does not <S%H6030>answer,<s%> I have to <S%H2603>implore<s%> him with my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
"My <S%H7307>breath<s%> is <S%H9101>offensive<s%> to my <S%H802>wife,<s%> And I am <S%H9152>loathsome<s%> to my own <S%H1121>brothers.<s%> <S%H990><s%>
<S%H1571>"Even<s%> <S%H5759>young<s%> <S%H5759>children<s%> <S%H3988>despise<s%> me; I <S%H6965>rise<s%> up and they <S%H1696>speak<s%> against me.
<S%H3605>"All<s%> my <S%H4962>associates<s%> <S%H8581>abhor<s%> me, And <S%H2088>those<s%> I <S%H157>love<s%> have <S%H2015>turned<s%> against me.
"My <S%H6106>bone<s%> <S%H1692>clings<s%> to my <S%H5785>skin<s%> and my <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> And I have <S%H4422>escaped<s%> [only] by the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of my <S%H8127>teeth.<s%>
<S%H2603>"Pity<s%> me, <S%H2603>pity<s%> me, O you my <S%H7453>friends,<s%> For the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> has <S%H5221>struck<s%> me.
<S%H4100>"Why<s%> do you <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me as <S%H410>God<s%> [does,] And are not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with my <S%H1320>flesh<s%>?
<S%H4310>"Oh<s%> <S%H5414><s%> that my <S%H4405>words<s%> were <S%H3789>written!<s%> <S%H4310>Oh<s%> <S%H5414><s%> that they were <S%H2710>inscribed<s%> in a <S%H5612>book!<s%>
"That with an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H5842>stylus<s%> and <S%H5777>lead<s%> They were <S%H2672>engraved<s%> in the <S%H6697>rock<s%> <S%H5703>forever!<s%>
"And as for me, I <S%H3045>know<s%> that my <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> And at the <S%H314>last<s%> He will <S%H6965>take<s%> His <S%H6965>stand<s%> on the <S%H6083>earth.<s%>
"Even <S%H310>after<s%> my <S%H5785>skin<s%> is <S%H9346>destroyed,<s%> Yet from my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> I shall <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H433>God;<s%>

<S%H834>Whom<s%> I <S%H589>myself<s%> shall <S%H2372>behold,<s%> And whom my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> and not <S%H2114>another.<s%> My <S%H3629>heart<s%> <S%H3615>faints<s%> <S%H2436>within<s%> me.
<S%H3588>"If<s%> you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>'How<s%> shall we <S%H7291>persecute<s%> him?' And 'What <S%H8328>pretext<s%> for a <S%H1697>case<s%> against him can we <S%H4672>find<s%>?'

"[Then] be <S%H9076>afraid<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> for yourselves, For <S%H2534>wrath<s%> [brings] the <S%H5771>punishment<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H4616>So<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> there is <S%H1779>judgment.<s%>"
